# VEHICLE::ENABLE_VEHICLE_DYNAMIC_AMBIENT_SCALES

## Summary
Enable the dynamic update of the ambient scales on a vehicle

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle: Index - Index of the vehicle.

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Remove the weird shadow applied by DISABLE_VEHCILE_DYNAMIC_AMBIENT_SCALES.
